cause.description:
molly wants to come see me and all the other wonderful interns. she needs roughly 11.4 dollars from 20 people to get a plane ticket.
molly is a great girl loves long walks through the african slums and has kill a goat to survive (just to show her serious side) she has an adorable laugh and we really want her to come visit so you better donate something or we'll come after you and we have people in other countries kenya specifically.
j-yeah
1. Position #1
cause.name: SEND US MOLLY
